title: Jennifer Lopez sizzles in black leather shorts with Owen Wilson on the set of Marry Me
text:
She scored some of the best reviews of her career and instantly generated Oscar buzz with the release of her film Hustlers.

Now Jennifer Lopez is already at work on her follow-up film Marry Me, a romantic comedy featuring Owen Wilson, 50.

The 50–year–old actress and singer was spotted Friday night on set in New York City while filming a scene in a striking pair of leather shorts.

New project: Jennifer Lopez, 50, was spotted on the set of her upcoming romantic comedy Marry Me opposite her co-star Owen Wilson, 50

Jennifer rocked an edgy look with her costume, which featured the aforementioned leather shorts which she paired with a cream-colored blouse left unbuttoned at the top.

The 5ft5in Out Of Sight star showed off her svelte legs, which terminated in a pair of tall black boots.

She looked fierce with her double-breasted black overcoat, which featured buttons with a crimson trim.

Jennifer's brunette tresses were held back tightly in a high ponytail, which she tied off with a floppy striped bow.

Back in black: Jennifer highlighted her fit legs with a pair of black leather shorts, which she paired with tall black boots

Bundled up: The Hustler's star completed her costume with a fierce black overcoat

Owen's character affected a much more casual look with a plaid shirt and a gray–blue jacket.

He also had on a pair of dark blue jeans and brown suede sneakers.

The Life Aquatic star brought along an English Bulldog for the filmed stroll, which he carried aloft at one point after the pooch got tired of walking.

No fuss: Owen's character was dressed casually in a plaid shirt with dark jeans and gray–blue jacket

Jennifer and Owen's new film is based on the graphic novel of the same name by Bobby Crosby about a pop singer whose world is thrown upside down after she learns that her rocker boyfriend has been cheating on her only moments before they're set to tie the knot at Madison Square Garden.

After an emotion-fueled meltdown on stage, Jennifer's character picks a random person out of the audience to marry instead, with the lucky man being Owen's math teacher character, who happens to be holding a sign reading 'Marry Me.'

The film is a return of sorts for the If You Had My Love singer, who lit up movie screens early in her career with romantic comedy hits like Maid In Manhattan and The Wedding Planner.

The shoot also comes after a break from film for Owen Wilson, who hasn't appeared in a movie since 2017's Father Figures.

He already finished shooting on his longtime collaborator Wes Anderson's upcoming movie The French Dispatch, which is expected in January 2020.
description: Jennifer Lopez showed off her svelte legs in a pair of black leather shorts while filming a scene from her upcoming rom-com Marry Me with Owen Wilson. The graphic novel-based film is set for a 2020 release.
